# 

`causalwiz` is an R package for causal inference analysis. It provides
functions for estimating treatment effects using various statistical
methods, features built-in plotting functions an utilities designed for
causal inference workflows in R.

## Installation

You can install the package via Github repository:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("carminemnc/causalwiz")
```

# Package index

## Overview

Package overview

- [`causalwiz`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/causalwiz-package.md)
  [`causalwiz-package`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/causalwiz-package.md)
  : causalwiz: Tools for Causal Inference Analysis

## Aesthetics

Visualization and plotting functions

- [`cov_bal_plot()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/cov_bal_plot.md)
  : Create covariates balance plot
- [`prop_plot()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/prop_plot.md)
  : Create propensity score distribution plot
- [`ctheme()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/ctheme.md)
  : Custom theme for ggplot2

## Estimators

Treatment effect estimation methods

- [`ipw_estimators()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/ipw_estimators.md)
  : Estimate treatment effects using IPW or AIPW methods
- [`aipw_balancer()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/aipw_balancer.md)
  : Calculate covariate balance metrics

## Utilities

Utilities functions

- [`get_formula()`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/get_formula.md)
  : Generate formula for model specification

## Datasets

Datasets

- [`welfare_small`](https://carminemnc.github.io/causalwiz/reference/welfare_small.md)
  : Welfare Dataset (Small Version)
